title: Out Are the Lights
description: Got a taste for terror?Come and scream with the kids at the late-night movie at THE HAUNTED PALACE!Every week there's a new episode of "Schreck". Every week a new victim faces horror while you watch. Who'd ever think movies made right here in our own town could be so authentic-looking? The blood looks so . . . bloody. The actors look so scared. And you'd swear all those horrible things are really happening.It's only a movie, but, wow!
author: Richard Laymon
